vocabulary

Interface VocabularyBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutocompleteOptions, DictionaryTree, Vocabulary

    public interface VocabularyBuilder
    Interface representing the functionality of a vocabulary object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addWord(java.lang.String word)
      Add this word to the vocabulary.
      boolean isWord(java.lang.String s)
      Checks if the string is a word according to this dictionary
      int size() 

    • Method Detail

      • addWord

        boolean addWord(java.lang.String word)
        Add this word to the vocabulary.
        Parameters:
        word - The word to add
        Returns:
        true if the word was added to the dictionary(it wasn't already there).

      • isWord

        boolean isWord(java.lang.String s)
        Checks if the string is a word according to this dictionary
        Parameters:
        s - - string to check
        Returns:
        True if it is contained in the dictionary

      • size

        int size()
        Returns:
        the number of words in the vocabulary
